alert.note: Alert for Lewis; Mason (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 03 at 11:31AM EST until January 03 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of Kentucky and Ohio, including the following counties, in Kentucky, Lewis and Mason. In Ohio, Adams and Brown. * WHEN...Until 1230 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1129 AM EST, local law enforcement reported lingering minor flooding. Some roadways still had lingering high water, but the most rapid flooding has ended. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Maysville, Washington, West Union, Manchester, Ripley, Aberdeen, Vanceburg, Lewisburg, Tollesboro, Rome, Concord, Trinity, Rectorville, Ribolt, Herron Hill, Bradysville, Epworth, Orangeburg and Bentonville.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. To report flooding, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
